features: ❀SATISFACTION GUARANTEE UNDERWEAR❀- You're covered by our 100% full money-back guarantee. ❤Add to Cart NOW❤ ❤If you aren't 100% in love with your hipster panties, we’re happy to OFFER ❤FREE ❤refund/replace/exchange per your convenience within 61 Days.UMMISS Hipster Panties is your right choice with No Worry.
❀NO SHOW UNDERWEAR❀ - Thin flat and stretchy elastic waistband at the top offer a smooth appearance for no show purpose. Serve well for tight/skinny jeans and dresses/skirts
❀HIPSTER PANTIES❀ - The waistband hits right at the waistline, about 2 or 8 inches below belly buttons(please see model pictures for more reference). Serve well for low rise jeans/pants/dresses

❀A MUST HAVE HIPSTER UNDERWEAR❀- Gift idea for your female friends/mother/Grandma.These panties are not only suitable for Everyday Use, Perfect for workout and any other oaccasion. Great matching with dresses,both low & high rise pants & jeans.

❀GREAT VIVID COLORS DESIGN & PERFECT FIT❀- Brief women's underwear provides a flattering look with comfortable coverage under any outfit. Cotton stretch panties, ❤No Pilling❤No Rolling ❤ No Bunching❤Bind-proof leg openings, stays In place all day,Cotton has Fine Permeability Which Keeps you Cool and Dry.UMMISS COTTON underwear are very functional and you can wear them with your skirts, as well as your flared dresses,high-waist jeans.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DOUBLE LAYER CROTCH Stitching neatly no extra line Double layer crotch nice fit Fitted tailoring health and Soft STURDY STITCHING Soft and not scratchy No rubbing or chafing Be Flattering under clothes PREMIUM MATERIAL 95% Cotton + 5% Spandex Comfortable&Breathable No Fading and rolling TAGLESS DESIGN No more annoying size tags More different colors to choice Perfect and shapely,Offer superior comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look no further!
reviews.reviewText: These are the best panties I have ever worn. Comfy. Perfect sizing. And best of all; they don’t fall down!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best underwear ever for many reasons!
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised when I ordered the UMMISS Womens Underwear, Mid Waist, No Muffin Top Full Coverage Cotton Brief. They fit perfectly, are comfortable, don’t cling to clothing, don’t ride up, washed well (even after several washings they still look new) well made, nice fabric. I like them so much I threw all my underwear away because it’s the only kind of underwear I wear now. 😊 I’m looking forward to trying the Unmiss Waist High Women’s underwear when size medium is back in stock yet again. (They seem to fit true to size, I’m 5‘8“ and weigh 135lbs )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Issues with Sizing
reviews.reviewText: Bought my wife a set of size small which fit perfectly. The price is right and the cotton is soft and comfortable. So we ordered another size small set, but during use she noticed these were significantly smaller. It wasn't one pair; the entire second set was significantly smaller than the original size small, so much so that she could easily pick them out from the original set. So we returned them, ordered another set, same problem. Finally we bought a medium which fits like the original small we ordered. Did they mislabel a medium? We may never know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These undies are comfy but very thin and rip easily. I've already ripped 2 just by pulling down my pants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for after my Abdominalplasty and I would 💯% recommended these to anyone. They fit snug and I probably could've gone up a size, but mine are perfect. They fall just below my incision so no aggravation. I will absolutely buy again.I bought the large going from 209 pre-op to 197 post-op.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Cotton wear with great overall support
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these a couple months back and thought they were the best with the exception that they do run a size large ( ex: if you wear large-- order a medium) the first set had 1 pair which for some reason were smaller than the rest . Unfortunately when I went to reorder- I ordered from another vendor ( a tad less expensive) ; those were cut real high up from the thigh to stomach area ( like bikini style- which lacked material & support in this area). I had ordered a size smaller - which fit perfect & that further confirmed the need to order one size smaller from this current company.After several years of wearing support nylon, spandex wear- I suddenly became allergic to the nylon/spandex; subsequently beginning my search for cotton wear with the support I liked which was a task. And then... I found this wonderful product. These are made from cotton, super soft, provide overall "great support" ( cotton providing this great support- who knew)--never to look back on the issues of the past wear & its materials. I could just never go back and I'm sure anyone ordering these wonderful woman undies never will either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, great price some tummy control great for after surgery.
reviews.reviewText: I used these panties after having a C- Section. I chose these because the lace detail gives an appealing look. So far so good. They are comfortable, soft do not roll down and fit to my mid stomach. All the things I was looking for. They do have a little tummy control and will help a little with having a flattering fit under clothes. They do fit true to size so keep that in mind while recovering if you need to order a size down to account for after your swelling goes down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars just didnt care for the fit.

reviews.reviewText: The product is of good quality !! Only problem is that I ordered the dark coloured set but have received the light coloured set.

reviews.reviewTitle: Different from the one shown in the advertised as in Amazon
reviews.reviewText: The elastic strap was shown wide but it's not so. Do not waste money in the belief that it would serve the purpose
